title: The Ice Ghosts Mystery
description: Perry, Mab, Oriole Bird and their mother fly to Austria in search of their Professor Bird has disappeared while investigating strange earth tremors. Villainous Dr. Pfnur is clearly up to no good, but surely he can’t be making earthquakes! And surely the giant “Ice Ghost” Mab sees can’t be real—can it? A “thoroughly absorbing and original mystery story.”— Children’s Books of the Year (London). “The plot is ingeniously woven and sustained in a beautifully vivid setting.”— The Horn Book
author: Jane Louise Curry
